Japanese Verb Transformer

A terminal program that allows you to input a Japanese verb and transform it to any of its other forms.

Japanese Support for Monkeytype

I successfully was able to add Japanese language support to the popular speedtyping website.

Zotero-to-Obsidian scrip

A script that converts data about your resources from Zotero to Obsidian

Material Shell Website

The Material Shell project is an attempt at rethinking the way we interface with our desktops. I designed and built their website - and made it look like Material Shell itself.

Sashin Exists

Sashin Exists is my home as a writer featuring my articles on science, philosophy, spirituality and more. I built it in 2018 using Ghost.

Conversation Culture

Conversation Culture is an initiative to improve the quality of our discourse across different political, philosophical and religious views.
